==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|めい|おう|せい|yomi=o}}
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}

===Etymology===
From a compound of {{compound|ja|冥王|tr1=Meiō|t1=[[king|King]] of the [[underworld|Underworld]]|tr2=sei|星|t2=[[star]]|sort=めいおうせい}}, coined by {{w|Hōei Nojiri}} in 1930 as a reference to [[Pluto]], the [[Greco-Roman]] god of the underworld.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|acc=h|acc2=3|y=ko|めいおうせい}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|めいおうせい|proper|hhira=めいわうせい}}

# {{lb|ja|astronomy|sort=めいおうせい}} [[Pluto]]
